biography: BJ Minson is a mechanical engineer, product designer, and minimalist. He's obsessed with robotics, electric cars and high tech manufacturing. He loves challenging problems, creating new and simple solutions and producing amazing products.Winslow Burton is a neat freak and social butterfly. With an excellent work ethic, friendly smile, and a "Git-er-done" attitude, he is a top performer. Winslow loves back-breaking labor and long walks on the beach.Kevin Rogers is an artist, builder, tinkerer, outdoorsman, and can do basically anything. He can talk to anyone about anything and is building a cabin in the woods to get away from everyone.David Burton is a lawyer by schooling, but not at heart (or we would hate him). He's a contrarian, libertarian, disciplinarian, sagittarian, militarian and vegetarian. He is analytical and makes heartless decisions with a robotic precision. He pushes everything forward.GRIP6 is a startup company dedicated to designing, delivering and manufacturing effective, innovative, and amazing products that people fall in love with and that will last a lifetime.
